title: Reckoning Book Release Live Stream Party
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: What!? Another bonus for being a Patron... thanks, Mary you’re awesome. Join the cool kids club guys, we get all the early tea ;)

very happy for you! In my book you deserve the world Mary :)

edit: just noticed my pun, hahaha
description:
Reckoning is available exclusively at www.maryannmoody.us for the special Halloween price of $1.99.

Celebrate the release of my 5th novel with me, MaryGirl Moody, during this special live stream. I'll give away free digital copies of my novels and a major prize pack. (PRIZE PACK ONLY FOR US VIEWERS) 

--Online Book Release Party:
